title: Hold Up—31 Classy Nordstrom Shoes That Dropped Just in Time for Summer
description: Hold Up—31 Classy Nordstrom Shoes That Dropped Just in Time for Summer
excerpt: Shop our selection of Nordstrom's best summer shoe new arrivals.
text: If you're looking to add a solid new pair of shoes to your summer lineup but hate the hassle of hopping from site to site, look no further. Here at WWW, we're big Nordstrom fans because it's the perfect one-stop shop to tackle most of your fashion needs. Recently, I've seen a plethora of classy summer shoe arrivals pop up on Nordstrom's website that are worth checking out. Since shopping is quite literally my job, I've done the tedious parts for you and combed through every new summer shoe arrival on site at Nordstrom and highlighted the best of the best below.Yes, you heard right. I took the hard part out of online shopping by handpicking the best new Nordstrom shoes worth snagging for summer. Do you have a tropical vacation coming up? Attending a wedding soon? No matter the occasion or reason, there's a special pair ahead just for you. You can expect everything from gorgeous sandals with the most fun details to easy flat shoe styles that still scream classy fashion person. Keep scrolling to uncover my top-tier shoe selections for summer. Tony Bianco Pru Kitten Heel Slide Sandal Tony Bianco strikes again. Sam Edelman Marcie Ballet Flat Sam Edelman Lily Ankle Wrap Flat Pair with your favorite linen dress or set. MANGO Laser Cut Pointed Toe Slingback Pump Such a pretty pair of slingbacks. Sperry Authentic Original Two-Eye Boat Shoe In case you haven't heard, boat shoes are back. Larroudé Florence Broderie Pump This baby blue is such a great summer color. Prada Triangle Logo Slide Sandal If you're feeling like splurging on your slides, these Prada ones might be worth considering. Tory Burch Mini Bow Espadrille Ankle Strap Wedge Sandal The red! The bows! So many cute details. VIVAIA Margot Mary-Jane Square-Toe Ballet Flats I have some Vivaia flats and can confirm that they're so very, very comfy. MANGO Slingback Kitten Heel Sandal These will go with so much. Vince Barcelona Jelly Cage Mule Jelly shoes are back, and this Vince pair has been trending among the fashion set. You can't go wrong with classic black ballet flats. Loeffler Randall Frank Slingback Sandal Open Edit Jaydin Slide Sandal Pair with your favorite jeans, skirts, and dresses. Havaianas Slim Square Flip Flop The square toes make these flip-flops look more elevated. Open Edit Zuri Ankle Strap Sandal These orange beauties would look great with your next wedding guest dress. Loeffler Randall Landon Studded Ballet Flat The studs are everything. Sam Edelman Carla Ankle Wrap Sandal These lace-up sandals are further proof that florals on sandals are such a big trend this summer. Jeffrey Campbell Preciosa Kitten Heel Sandal Yes to the disco-like hardware. Birkenstock Arizona Big Buckle Slide Sandal They're a classic for a reason. adidas Handball Spezial Sneaker Soft-pink suede and navy is such a pretty color combination. adidas Japan Low Top Sneaker Another pair of Adidas for your consideration. Open Edit Tori Kitten Heel Sandal I can't believe these are only $50. Steve Madden Hazel Slide Sandal Don't you just love it when a pair of shoes goes with everything? Dolce Vita Leanna Slide Sandal Easy slide sandals that have such an elevated look. MANGO Buckle Strap Fishnet Ballet Flat These mesh ballet flats are having a moment. Tony Bianco Esmae Slingback Pump There's something so satisfying about snake print. Jeffrey Campbell Fathom Flat These look so much more expensive than they actually are. Pair with your favorite jeans and a comy sweater. Salomon Gender Inclusive Xt-6 Sneaker Many of our editors own this fashion-set staple. Sam Edelman Michaela Mary Jane Flat Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor who relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast office in 2022. At WWW, she utilizes over 10 years of editorial experience to dish out shopping advice to the masses and analyze key pop-cultural moments. Chichi previously worked at Refinery29, where she helped revolutionize the brand’s plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage. In her spare time, she’s keeping up with the latest movie releases, enjoying a relaxing day at the spa, or obsessing over her latest ADHD-fueled hyperfixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, the negative effects of bicoastal intellectual elitism, and Gen Z’s loneliness epidemic). You can find her online @thechichio on Instagram.
html:
If you're looking to add a solid new pair of shoes to your summer lineup but hate the hassle of hopping from site to site, look no further. Here at WWW, we're big Nordstrom fans because it's the perfect one-stop shop to tackle most of your fashion needs. Recently, I've seen a plethora of classy summer shoe arrivals pop up on Nordstrom's website that are worth checking out. Since shopping is quite literally my job, I've done the tedious parts for you and combed through every new summer shoe arrival on site at Nordstrom and highlighted the best of the best below.

Yes, you heard right. I took the hard part out of online shopping by handpicking the best new Nordstrom shoes worth snagging for summer. Do you have a tropical vacation coming up? Attending a wedding soon? No matter the occasion or reason, there's a special pair ahead just for you. You can expect everything from gorgeous sandals with the most fun details to easy flat shoe styles that still scream classy fashion person. Keep scrolling to uncover my top-tier shoe selections for summer.

Tony Bianco

Pru Kitten Heel Slide Sandal

Tony Bianco strikes again.

Sam Edelman

Marcie Ballet Flat

Sam Edelman

Lily Ankle Wrap Flat

Pair with your favorite linen dress or set.

MANGO

Laser Cut Pointed Toe Slingback Pump

Such a pretty pair of slingbacks.

Sperry

Authentic Original Two-Eye Boat Shoe

In case you haven't heard, boat shoes are back.

Larroudé

Florence Broderie Pump

This baby blue is such a great summer color.

Prada

Triangle Logo Slide Sandal

If you're feeling like splurging on your slides, these Prada ones might be worth considering.

Tory Burch

Mini Bow Espadrille Ankle Strap Wedge Sandal

The red! The bows! So many cute details.

VIVAIA

Margot Mary-Jane Square-Toe Ballet Flats

I have some Vivaia flats and can confirm that they're so very, very comfy.

MANGO

Slingback Kitten Heel Sandal

These will go with so much.

Vince

Barcelona Jelly Cage Mule

Jelly shoes are back, and this Vince pair has been trending among the fashion set.

You can't go wrong with classic black ballet flats.

Loeffler Randall

Frank Slingback Sandal

Open Edit

Jaydin Slide Sandal

Pair with your favorite jeans, skirts, and dresses.

Havaianas

Slim Square Flip Flop

The square toes make these flip-flops look more elevated.

Open Edit

Zuri Ankle Strap Sandal

These orange beauties would look great with your next wedding guest dress.

Loeffler Randall

Landon Studded Ballet Flat

The studs are everything.

Sam Edelman

Carla Ankle Wrap Sandal

These lace-up sandals are further proof that florals on sandals are such a big trend this summer.

Jeffrey Campbell

Preciosa Kitten Heel Sandal

Yes to the disco-like hardware.

Birkenstock

Arizona Big Buckle Slide Sandal

They're a classic for a reason.

adidas

Handball Spezial Sneaker

Soft-pink suede and navy is such a pretty color combination.

adidas

Japan Low Top Sneaker

Another pair of Adidas for your consideration.

Open Edit

Tori Kitten Heel Sandal

I can't believe these are only $50.

Steve Madden

Hazel Slide Sandal

Don't you just love it when a pair of shoes goes with everything?

Dolce Vita

Leanna Slide Sandal

Easy slide sandals that have such an elevated look.

MANGO

Buckle Strap Fishnet Ballet Flat

These mesh ballet flats are having a moment.

Tony Bianco

Esmae Slingback Pump

There's something so satisfying about snake print.

Jeffrey Campbell

Fathom Flat

These look so much more expensive than they actually are.

Pair with your favorite jeans and a comy sweater.

Salomon

Gender Inclusive Xt-6 Sneaker

Many of our editors own this fashion-set staple.

Sam Edelman

Michaela Mary Jane Flat

Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor who relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast office in 2022. At WWW, she utilizes over 10 years of editorial experience to dish out shopping advice to the masses and analyze key pop-cultural moments. Chichi previously worked at Refinery29, where she helped revolutionize the brand’s plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage. In her spare time, she’s keeping up with the latest movie releases, enjoying a relaxing day at the spa, or obsessing over her latest ADHD-fueled hyperfixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, the negative effects of bicoastal intellectual elitism, and Gen Z’s loneliness epidemic). You can find her online @thechichio on Instagram.
